shortdesc.ph: Starts local audio playback device test.

section.p: After calling this method, the SDK plays the specified audio file. If you can hear the audio, it indicates that the playback device is working properly. After the call, the SDK triggers the callback every 100 ms to report the volume information of the playback device with uid 1. The difference between this method and is that only tests the local audio playback device, while tests both audio/video devices and network conditions.
section.note: Call this method before joining a channel. After the test is complete, call before joining the channel to stop the test.

plentry.pd: Path to the audio file, a UTF-8 encoded string. Supported formats: wav, mp3, m4a, and aac. Supported sample rates: 8000, 16000, 32000, 44100, and 48000 Hz.
